1.content:
it was a normal day for you. walking home from your auntie's were you go to get some time to yourself. then you pass your friends house. they were currently doing homework so they couldn't come out yet. this just made your day worse. this was because your drawings were burned by some of the 'cooler kids'.

then you look up and see a shooting star. you wish for a better life, and more friends. you then laugh at yourself for thinking it would work. but then you see the wishing star hit the ground in a nearby field. thinking that it would be cool to get the stone you wished on you run to the crash sight.

when you get there you find a light blue stone that is pulsing red. you go to pick it up when you are suddenly hit by an electric pulse from the stone. then everything goes black....

when you wake up you find yourself on a beach with water thats as blue and clear as the sky. then you notice that something is different, you feel that in some way your different. You look into your reflection to find that your now a human-like...
1.title: The beginning!

choices: male.... but im meant to be a girl!
12.content: are you male or female?
12.title: fox

choices: can run at super sonic speed
121.content:
As you stare in shock at the red fox that is now you you start to realize that the wish had worked, and had put you into the world of your favorite character... sonic the hedgehog!

you then wonder if you have any powers and to your amazement you...
121.title: male, how i've always been

choices: a pair of jeans, a brown hoddie, black and white trainers and a red scarf.
1211.content:
as you start to think about what powers you have you suddenly get a tingling feeling in your legs. you get annoyed with this and decide to have a run, thinking that your legs had fallen asleep. then as you started to run you found yourself out of beach within a few seconds. this confused you at first, but as you started to run in the opposite direction you realized that you could run at super sonic speed! "well this may not be so bad" you said to no one in-particular.

for the rest of the day you were finding out what you could do and how easy it could be done. but as the sun set you realized that you would need a place to stay, so you began to look around and even went into the forest, but couldn't get that far in as it was too dark. then as you gave up hope you came across a small log cabin looking over the beach, but you could have sworn it was not there earlier.

as you enter you knock and ask if anyones home. you waited for a few minutes before knocking again, but there was no reply. then as you entered you noticed a wardrobe. it was at that moment that you realized you didn't have any clothes. as you opened it a robot came out and said that this unit is a one time use and can get you any item/items of clothing.

it then came up with a selection screen. as you looked you decided to pick...
1211.title: can run at super sonic speed

12112.content: As you were making your choice you felt a cold breeze go up your spine. then you decided to go with the winter clothes. you then noticed a black pair os running shoes and some black gloves, so you pick them too, and within a few minuets you was in your new attire. "this is cool" you said in a tired voice. you then decided to go to sleep there as there was no one there. as you lay in the bed you started to think about what happened and what your going to do. then you decided to...
12112.title: time to sleep

121122.content: Then you remember all the bad things about your life and you decide to stay and look around. you then fall asleep. the next day you are testing out your new powers when suddenly...
121122.title: explore this new world

1211221.content: then as you are testing your new tripple spin you hear a girl scream for help. you didont know what to do as if he goes then he may be more trouble than help, or you could be able to help them... but what to do?
1211221.title: the screem for help

choices: you try to triple spin but it fails
just as you show yourself a plane comes
12112211.content: you decided to help as it might be someone you knew. as you ran into the forest you came across a big spider robot. then out of nowhere it starts to rip trees out of the ground, and then you see a young girl in one of the bots claws. you could recognize them as amy rose, a sonic fan girl. this made you smile as this confirmed you were in sonic's world. then you saw one of the robot's arm break as a blue hedgehog seemed to slice straight throe it. "SONIC!" you scream in your head as he began brakeing more parts of the bot. then suddenly the bot grabs sonic and starts to crush him. you decide you've got to help.
12112211.title: help

choices: jump on the bots arm and break it
121122111.content: just before the robot crushes sonic you smash into it using a triple spin but this just dents it as its made of a titanium alloy. then the robot stops and looks at you. then a voice is played from it. " did you honestly think you can break this armor? not even sonic can destroy this robot with any ease. and now it will show you just how weak and small you are!" the voice said. then the bot started to attack you, but you doge with ease. then remembering all the bad things people have called you and all the bad things people have done and you...
121122111.title: you try to triple spin but it fails

1211221111.content:
you then decide to triple spin again, but this time using the pain you have experienced you maenad to completely rip the robot apart. then as the dust settles you see sonic come carrying amy. "hey thanks for the save buddy, what is your name!" the blue blur said

you then stopped to think, then said "my name is..."
1211221111.title: triple spin again

choices: go back to sleep, it was just a dream.
12112211111.content:
"My name is Dash... Dash the Fox!" you replied. sonic was glad to meet you and asked how you done that. you said you didn't know how, you just suddenly did. sonic then offered you to come with him to meet his friends. you accepted.

when you got to a clearing you found a big workshop. then you went in and sonic introduced you to another fox. "hi nice to meet you, my name is miles prower but you can call me tails!" you then greeted him and he showed you to your room. whilst you were sleeping you had a dream about your old life. but little did you know that this was what was happening at the current moment back in your world.

*FLASHBACK*

you see your friend levee her house. then her brother comes out and asks were she is going. she tells him that she is going to look for you. her brother tells her to be careful and be back soon, before going back in. as she is looking in the field that you found the meteorite. were she finds your clothes, she is shocked and falls to her knees crying. then as she reaches for her phone she sees the stone that sent you to this world and goes to pick it up. you try to shout at her to stop but she cant hear you, then just as she touches it you wake up.

what do you do?
12112211111.title: Dash the Fox!

choices: there is a young female fox on the floor
121122111111.content: you rush out the door and within a few seconds you are at the beach were...
121122111111.title: go to the beach!

1211221111111.content: as you get there you see a young fox on the sand. you pick her up and say...
1211221111111.title: there is a young female fox on the floor

12112211111111.content:
as you are calling her name the orange fox wakes up. as first she is speechless, but then gets up and screams demanding you to tell her what has happened. you tell her to calm down and tell her who you are. when she finds out that its you she immediately hugs you. whilst you embrace her you notice the same cabin you got your clothes from, so you take her to get some new clothes.

she chooses a knee length skirt, red long sleeve jumper, blue scarf, brown gloves and a pair of knee high brown and black boots. you then comment on how she looks before telling her what has happened and were they can stay. she trusts you so you go outside when...
12112211111111.title: Jessica the Fox

choices: tell him to hit once the shield is down...
121122111111112.content: suddenly a bomb lands near you so you grab her and jump out the way. she couldent believe what was happining. then a bigger robot than last time comes into view. this time it was more of a human looking one with a gun for one hand and a claw as the other. eggman then shows himself and gloats that this time his robot is unbeatible as it has a shield that is powerd by a chaos emerald. it then fires a laser at you so you pick up jessica and jump out the way again. you then put her down and triple spin into the robot but only to gt a massive electric shock. as you fall and hit the ground you realize that this is going to be a lot harder than last time. then you get back up and see sonic come along. you decide to...
121122111111112.title: eggman shows up

choices: you wake up a week later
1211221111111122.content: you know that there wont be anyway to beat it whilst that shield is up so you tell sonic to make this count. you then look at jessica and say "Im sorry" she gives you a strange look and asks you what your sorry for. you then say "this!" and at that moment you jumped onto the the robot and took in all of the energy. sonic the shouted at you and told you to stop, but you refused to. after about a few seconds you fell to the ground. then sonic realized that you had drained the shield. then sonic took the shoot and destroyed the robot and took the emerald. then jessica ran up to you and held your head in her arms. sonic then tells her that you had absorbed a loot of chaos energy and might not make it.
1211221111111122.title: SHOCKING!

info.brief_description: you wake up to find your self in a new world!
info.description: On your way home from your auntie's you find a strange stone that you watched fall from the sky. You wish that you could have a better life as your current one is horrible, you get picked on at school, you don't get treated kindly at home and are always getting beaten, but the only thing that is keeping you here is your love, and only true friend! Then that night something very strange happens, and you find yourself in a new world!
